requestPayment.DESKTOP_WEB: xpath=//div[contains(text(),'Send Payment Request to customers via Email & SMS. Plus Bulk Requests!')]

email.DESKTOP_WEB: xpath=//input[@placeholder='Enter a 10-digit mobile number or an Email ID']

paymentPurpose.DESKTOP_WEB: xpath=//input[@placeholder='What is this payment for? (max 30 chars)']
